description: Information about other organisms that this organism is related to.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

is_child_of.description: This organism is a child of the indicated organism.

is_parent_of.description: This organism is a parent of the indicated organism.

is_sibling_of.description: This organism is a sibling of the indicated organism.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

title: familial_relationship
